title: FS: T206 Matty White Cap SC 150 Factory 649 Double Name
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Matty White Cap SC 150 Factory 649 Double Name
posts.post_content:
Nice crease free Matty white cap from the fairly tough Sweet Caporal 150 factory 649 series. These are about as tough as an EPDG or Tolstoi back.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains094/Scan_20150627_zpsfkksociv.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains094/Scan_20150627%203_zpsfpsqqige.jpg[/IMG]

Asking $450 delivered.

Tom C
